channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: Passionate about making game developers more productive

item.title: Toolsmiths GDC 2018 Guide
item.description: There are around 650+ sessions at this year's GDC, and it isn't easy to find sessions that you as a tools developer might enjoy. I have tried to find and collect most of the talks that a tools developer would be interested in attending or watching after the fact.
